data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Eibar at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 1, Villarreal are in shooting range from this free kick.
Eibar to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Villarreal are caught offside.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Eibar close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
Eibar are whistled for offside.
In the minute 11, Villarreal are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
In Villarreal Villarreal attack through Samuel Chukwueze. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
Eibar have a goal kick.
Kike (Eibar) strikes at Estadio de la Ceramica but his header is cleared.
In the minute 14, The match at Estadio de la Ceramica has been interrupted briefly for a check on Pau Torres, who is down injured.
Throw-in Eibar.
Villarreal's Pau Torres looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 16, Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Eibar.
At Estadio de la Ceramica, Villarreal are penalized for being offside.
Villarreal needs to be cautious. Eibar have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 18, Takashi Inui for Eibar is whistled offside.
Throw-in Villarreal.
Throw-in for Eibar at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Villarreal.
In Villarreal Eibar drive forward through Takashi Inui. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Eibar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Villarreal.
At Estadio de la Ceramica, Recio has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Eibar's half?
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Eibar in their own half.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Takashi Inui of Eibar is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 27, Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
Villarreal advance rapidly upfield but Jorge Figueroa Vazquez blows for offside.
In the minute 30, Can Eibar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Villarreal's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Villarreal's Mario Gaspar gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Eibar defender.
In the minute 34, Villarreal's Paco Alcacer gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Eibar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Edu Exposito for Eibar drives towards goal at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Eibar have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Villarreal drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick Eibar.
Francis Coquelin (Villarreal) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 41, Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Villarreal have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Eibar.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Villarreal.
Samuel Chukwueze for the home team is judged to be offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
In the minute 45, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a throw-in for Eibar, close to Villarreal's area.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Villarreal will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Eibar.
In the minute 45, Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
The first-half has ended.
Eibar's Recio breaks free at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Throw-in for Eibar at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 84, Damian Kadzior is replacing Recio for Eibar at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Sergi Enrich is on a sub for Kike for Eibar.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, Unai Emery (Villarreal) is making a first substitution, with Takefusa Kubo replacing Samuel Chukwueze.
Villarreal make their second substitution with Manu Trigueros replacing Paco Alcacer.
In the minute 87, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Eibar goal kick.
Jose Luis Mendilibar is making the team's third substitution at Estadio de la Ceramica with Quique replacing Sergio Alvarez.
Eibar's Sergi Enrich gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Free kick for Villarreal in the half of Eibar.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Villarreal.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
Moi Gomez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Villarreal.
Villarreal push upfield but Jorge Figueroa Vazquez quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Important block from the Villarreal defence as Miguel Atienza fires in a strike for Eibar.
Eibar have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Eibar throw-in in Villarreal's half.
In Villarreal Villarreal drive forward through Takefusa Kubo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
